author: farhan
title: TOXIC FUMES SURROUND BURNING TUAS CHEMICAL WASTE PLANT, NEA & JTC NEGLIGENT?
text:
TOXIC FUMES SURROUND BURNING TUAS CHEMICAL WASTE PLANT, NEA & JTC NEGLIGENT?   Advertisement 
<Credits: Chengmin Wang> 
This is ECO Special Waste Management, a toxic and hazardous waste collector. When factory of this kind is on fire, the surrounding atmosphere is filled to toxic fumes and dust. This is not the first toxic and hazardous waste collector on fire. 
This shown that NEA and JTC are not doing their upmost to supervise these waste collectors to protect public health & Safety. 
On 22 May 1977, a huge fire broke out at ChemSolv. The drums on fire rocketed into the nearby Tuas Navy Base! Source:
